# Pull Request

## Description

<!-- Provide a brief description of the changes in this PR -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test improvements

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] All unit tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] All E2E tests pass (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] Test coverage meets thresholds (`npm run test:coverage`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Existing tests updated as needed

## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Performance impact considered

## Documentation

- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Inline code documentation added
- [ ] TESTING.md updated (if test changes)

---

### Automated Checks

The following will run automatically when you submit this PR:

- ✅ Unit and integration tests
- ✅ E2E tests with Playwright
- ✅ Code coverage analysis
- ✅ Build verification

Test results and coverage will be posted as a comment on this PR.
